title: Latest Galaxy Watch 4 update improves Samsung Health, brings March security patch
content:
The Galaxy Watch 4 is one of the best Wear OS-powered smartwatches on the market right now. It also remains the only smartwatch to run Wear OS 3 out of the box. Packed with the best-in-class hardware, the Galaxy Watch 4 has kept getting better over time with timely software updates. The watch is now

The post Latest Galaxy Watch 4 update improves Samsung Health, brings March security patch appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has started rolling out a new software update to the Galaxy Watch 4. The update carries build number R870XXU1FVC8.
